summary: When the world is taken over by flesh eating zombies, best friends Tommy and Edwin figure out a way to benefit from it by turning zombies into fertilizer for growing potent weed! There will be bud.
cast: Simone Bailly|Mark Sweatman|Jy Harris|Barry Nerling|Vince Laxton|Cher Staite|Allan Kipling|Scott Fraser|Tony Langhorn|Roy Whyte|Lea Coffman|Thomas Newman|Aaron Harrison|Jason Lee|Mike Harilstad|Sharon Harilstad|Temujin Shilo|Michael Roberds|Gabriel Medina|Robin Langlands|Tanzyn Ambrose|Rose Greenwood|Tri Cao|Barry Thomas|Linda Thomas|Julia von Ludadou|Mike Bridden|Karen Deol|Annie Beaudry|Danny Helmo|Amber Louise Van Tighem|Harry Shannon|Jae Woo Kang|Carlo Fanella|Katie Hayter|Lindsay Hilton|Trina McIlroy|Kelly McLeod|Carmen Mcleod|Chanel Mcleod|Rebekah Roblin-Mcleod|Samantha McLeod|Catherine Ayala Whyte|Jessica Poirier
title: Bong of the Dead
